sn14.35:4.2: “Mendicants, if you enjoy the earth element, you enjoy suffering.
sn14.35:4.3: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn14.35:4.4: If you enjoy the water element …
sn14.35:4.5: If you enjoy the fire element …
sn14.35:4.6: If you enjoy the air element, you enjoy suffering.
sn14.35:4.7: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn14.35:5.1: If you don’t enjoy the earth element, you don’t enjoy suffering.
sn14.35:5.2: If you don’t enjoy suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
sn14.35:5.3: If you don’t enjoy the water element …
sn14.35:5.4: If you don’t enjoy the fire element …
sn14.35:5.5: If you don’t enjoy the air element, you don’t enjoy suffering.
sn14.35:5.6: If you don’t enjoy suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
